review: Perfect...much better than the USB stuff on the market.  Works great!
author: Den Demron "Justaguy"

review: I got it for free with a sling tv promotion. It is good for using sling, but for all other media, devices like xbox or playstation work much quicker, with better user navigation.
author: Philip

review: Lover this!! So easy to install and use!!
author: Tami A. Calugi

review: Not a bad little streaming device.I mostly use it for streaming Amazon Prime shows and movies.It has a very nice app for Netflix too.
author: J Rook "RooK!"

review: WORKS REAL GOOD. I REALLY LIKE IT.
author: Gary Weaver

review: Guess I didn't do my research. Had no idea you had to have a Prime account just to watch anything. I still give three stars because of ease of hook up. You really can't watch much w/o subscriptions to several providers
author: Sonya

review: As expected, this my second fire stick for the bedroom so I don't have to move back and forth.
author: Linda Clemens
